import Mathlib

open Set

theorem Rudin_exercise_5_17 {f : â„ â†’ â„}
  (hf : ContDiffOn â„ 3 f (Set.Icc (-1 : â„) 1))
  (hvals : f (-1) = 0 âˆ§ f 0 = 0 âˆ§ f 1 = 1)
  (hder0 : deriv f 0 = 0) :
  âˆƒ x âˆˆ Set.Ioo (-1 : â„) 1, deriv (deriv (deriv f)) x â‰¥ 3 := by sorry
